title: Sports Learning Curriculum: Exploratory Skill Development Through an Ecological Dynamics Approach (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic sports technique comprehension and physical coordination skills
context.additional_context: Accessible smartphone-based VR simulation tools enabling learners to explore/experiment with sports techniques in real-world-like virtual spaces

learning_goals: Learners can identify changeable elements in sports environments according to ecological dynamics principles and develop at least three strategies to solve problems.
Learners can acquire sports skills through self-directed wayfinding in VR simulations and improve performance by over 20% by incorporating real-time feedback.
Learners can record and analyze their learning pathways during formative assessments, deriving at least five strengths and areas for improvement in exploratory learning.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
